message_warn.en: WARNING: Sensor {sensor} at station {meas_point} at {date} below the warning threshold. Last value is {value}. Immediate attention advised!
message_warn.de: WARNUNG: Sensor {sensor} an Station {meas_point} am {date} unter der Warnschwelle. Letzter Wert: {value}. Bitte umgehende Aufmerksamkeit!

message_dewarn.en: Sensor {sensor} at station {meas_point} is back above the warning threshold. Situation stabilized.
message_dewarn.de: Sensor {sensor} an Station {meas_point} liegt wieder über der Warnschwelle. Situation stabilisiert.

message_alarm.en: ALARM: Sensor {sensor} at station {meas_point} at {date} is below the alarm threshold. Last value is {value}. Critical situation detected!
message_alarm.de: ALARM: Sensor {sensor} an Station {meas_point} am {date} unter der Alarmschwelle. Letzter Wert: {value}. Kritische Situation erkannt!

message_dealarm.en: Sensor {sensor} at station {meas_point} is back above the alarm threshold. Critical issue resolved but please give attention.
message_dealarm.de: Sensor {sensor} an Station {meas_point} liegt wieder über der Alarmschwelle. Kritisches Problem behoben, bitte weiterhin aufmerksam bleiben.

message_deprecated.en: INFO: The data of the station {meas_point} and sensor {sensor} is from {date}. The data is outdated! Please verify the system.
message_deprecated.de: INFO: Die Daten von Station {meas_point} und Sensor {sensor} stammen vom {date}. Die Daten sind veraltet! Bitte System überprüfen.

message_dedeprecated.en: INFO: Station {meas_point} Sensor {sensor} is reporting current data again. The warning from {date} is deprecated. System functioning properly.
message_dedeprecated.de: INFO: Station {meas_point} Sensor {sensor} meldet wieder aktuelle Daten. Die Warnung vom {date} ist hinfällig. System funktioniert einwandfrei.
